p: The human hepatoma cell line (Huh 5.15NS replicon) with replicating sub-genomic HCV RNA (genotype 1b) was used as described. 22, 23 The infectious HCV cell culture (HCV cc) strain (J6JFH) as described 24 was inoculated into Huh 7.5 cells and harvested using published protocols. 25 Both replicon cell lines and Huh 7.5 cells met Institutional Review board requirements at their institutions of origin.
